QuestData.Title: Break Them Out
QuestData.Description: Magatha's not the only one that the Twilight's Hammer have taken prisoner.$B$BWhile you're up there to the south, you should break as many of them out as you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue 5 Bulwark Prisoners from the Twilight Jailers.
QuestData.RewardText: You give so much of yourself without requiring anything in return.$B$BThe people of Thousand Needles are grateful, as am I.
